title: Povomaa Oorvolam Lyrics Chinna Thambi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
odum poni aarum
paadum gaanam noorum
kaalamm yaavum therinbam
kaanumm neram aanandham

silu silu vena
ingirukkum kaathu angae
adikkumaa kidaikkuma

odum poni aarum
paadum gaanam noorum
kaalamm yaavum therinbam
kaanumm neram aanandham

karpanayil medhakkudhu
kandadhayum rasikkudhu
idhil enna oru sugam

kavidhai paadum kaaveri
jadhiyai serthu aadum
anaigal nooru pottaalum
adangidaama odum

odum poni aarum
paadum gaanam noorum
kaalamm yaavum therinbam
kaanumm neram aanandham
